ygData.msgSnippet: ... easy for them to say and difficult for us to test, would you agree? ... agreed, i only have a problem with the effects. ... well at level 50 the only
ygData.messageBody:
> 2) Bards have ways of reducing their taunt level now (Song of dawn,
> harmonic weapons)

easy for them to say and difficult for us to test, would you agree?

> 4) The singing steel BOOTS are AC 18. It's not like their
> AC Sucks they're
> still better than anything else we could get before,
> including imbrued.

agreed, i only have a problem with the effects.

> 5) The "Magic" number for AC is about 800 AC. After 800
> there seems to be
> a dramatic drop in the amount that you get hit. With buffs it's even
> better. Right now a level 50 warrior can get their AC to
> about 800 maybe
> 900 with items. We can get ours to about the same. With
> singing steel I
> will be able to get my AC (at 50th level) to over 900.
> (Warriors may be
> able to break 1000 with theirs)

well at level 50 the only singing steel you can even think of getting are
gloves and boots. you probably know where legs come from and you won't be
getting those. no one has even found the bracers, arms, helm, or especially
the breastplate, which could be a bitch to get even at 60. going with as
much AC as i can get, i am at 826AC at level 53. i just won an RBB (have
not tried it on yet, have to get it from the current owner who just got a
CoF) so that will give me a big boost over a 0 AC haste sash, and my defense
is at 205 at level 53 and i don't think that is maxxed. once i get the RBB
and max defense i estimate i will be just over 840AC at level 53 in full
imbrued and singing steel gloves (i can't wear the boots with the imbrued it
just looks awful, and gloves look ok and have more AC than my imbrued).


> Now... the effects on the armor REALLY ticks me off.

same here, i agree with all you say about the bard, i don't think the AC is
too low, etc etc etc. i just disagree about how easy you think it is be a
bard with 900AC. quite an exaggeration.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
